valworkbench.algorithms
Class HLink

java.lang.Object
  valworkbench.algorithms.HLink

public class HLink
extends java.lang.Object

The HLink class provides an object that encapsulate methods and state information for computing hierarchical agglomerative partition.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Raffaele Giancarlo, Davide Scaturro, Filippo Utro

Class constructor specifying: number of clusters required, input data matrix and hierarchical cluster method selected

Parameters:
nOfCluster - a integer representing the number of clusters required
dataMatrix - input data matrix of Data_Matrix type
type - a String representing the Hierarchical cluster method selected (A, C, S)

HLink

public HLink(int nOfCluster,
             DataMatrix dataMatrix,
             java.lang.String outputPath,
             java.lang.String type,
             boolean writeOutput)
Class constructor specifying number of clusters required, input data matrix, Hierarchical cluster method selected and output path for clustering solution

Parameters:
nOfCluster - a integer representing the number of clusters required
dataMatrix - a input data matrix of Data_Matrix type
outputPath - a String representing the path name for clustering output file
type - a String representing the type of hierarchical cluster method selected (A, C, S)
writeOutput - a boolean flag used to control if writing or not output solution on disk

HLink

public HLink(int nOfCluster,
             DataMatrix dataMatrix,
             ClusterMatrix clusterMatrix,
             java.lang.String outputPath,
             java.lang.String type,
             boolean writeOutput)
Class constructor specifying number of clusters required, input data matrix, hierarhical cluster method selected, input clustering matrix of Cluster_Matrix type, and output path for clustering solution

Parameters:
nOfCluster - a integer representing the number of clusters required
dataMatrix - an input data matrix of Data_Matrix type
clusterMatrix - an input clustering matrix of Cluster_Matrix type
outputPath - a String representing the path name for clustering output file
type - a String representing the hierarchical clustering method selected (A, C, S)
writeOutput - a boolean flag used to control if writing or not output solution on disk
See Also:
DataMatrix, ClusterMatrix
